title: Kang Mi-suk (curler)
text: Kang Mi-suk (born September 25, 1968) is a <a href="Wheelchair%20curling">wheelchair curler</a> from <a href="South%20Korea">South Korea</a>, and is on the South Korean wheelchair curling team. Her lower part of the body was paralysed due to an blood vessel abnormality with unknown causes.She participated at the <a href="Wheelchair%20curling%20at%20the%202014%20Winter%20Paralympics">2014 Winter Paralympics</a>, and <a href="Wheelchair%20curling%20at%20the%202010%20Winter%20Paralympics">2010 Winter Paralympics</a>, winning a silver medal.
